title: Global Function
description: Schema for a global function object. Global functions are reusable named definitions referenced from expressions throughout the model. A global function must have a name starting with underscore (e.g., '_Max', '_SetOfValues') and a logic object with a description. Parameters are optional. If validation fails, verify 'name' starts with underscore and 'logic' has a 'description'.

name.description: The name of the global function. Must start with an underscore (e.g., '_Max', '_SetOfValues'). This is required and must be non-empty.

parameters.description: Optional list of parameter names for the function (e.g., ['x', 'y']). Each parameter must be a non-empty string.

logic.description: The logic specification for this global function. Must contain at least a description.

description.description: A human-readable description of the function logic.

notation.description: Optional formal notation system used for the specification.

specification.description: Optional formal specification in the given notation.
